text: I craft the experience that wins hearts and drives opportunities.

bread: Worked as a lead designer in responsible for the start page and an incubating project to enable fashion customers discover and develop their unique style.

As the only UX designer in the design team, I created the core design value, interaction guideline and shipped the product withinn three months.

Created passenger journey and traveler personas to highlight the painpoints of HSR passenger, this research was adapted both by THSR and the passenger information displayer system manufacturing company Delta Electronic, Inc.
Worked as a UX designer and researcher that created the number one rated zero fee cryptocurrency exchange and won the Red Dot design award in 2018.
